resources.string: This Service is a service that is required to provide the functionality of the app. FakeStandby requires accessibility service to make it possible to run on every screen and in every app. The app is based on the accessibility service API so it wont work if this option is not enabled. This API will only used to provide the Overlay and will not save, collect or share any of the data that could be accessed by the service.
The Accessibility Service is not enabled

The Accessibility Service for FakeStandby is not enabled in your devices accessibility settings. To run the app that service has to be enabled. Simply open the accessibility settings, scroll down to "FakeStandby" and enable it.
The app has no permission to draw overlays

The app is not permitted to draw overlays over other apps. In order to to run the app you absolutely need to grant the overlay permission for FakeStandby, otherwise the action will be cancelled every time. The permission only makes it possible to draw content over the content of other apps and cannot be used for anything else. To grant the permission enable the switch on the following screen.
